item.title: Emacs cannot find pdflatex PATH
item.description: Problem description After installing Spacemacs, my org file cannot export to PDF file, the following error message always pops out: command not found: pdflatex Solution It finally turns out it is my Macbook move /usr/texbin to /Library/TeX/texbin, according to this answer, I added export PATH="$PATH:/Library/TeX/texbin"to my .zshrc. and then source .zshrc to update my settings. After restarting my emacs, finally Emacs can export org file to PDF file.
